title: Friday Post Show (09-03-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (09-03-21)
description:
Bobby starts by talking about the episode of The BobbyCast he just did with Matthew Ramsey of Old Dominion who revealed something he’s never talked about before. We also talk about how most people have triple screened in the last few months and debate whether or not Amy can do 10 push-ups. Plus a very famous piece of music memorabilia is up for auction this weekend. A caller asks when our Show Drafts are coming back. Bobby reveals when. Bobby also explains what an NIL is and how he has one with Jaylin Williams from Arkansas Basketball.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Plus a very famous piece of music memorabilia is up for auction this weekend. A caller asks when our Show Drafts are coming back. Bobby reveals when. Bobby also explains what an NIL is and how he has one with Jaylin Williams from Arkansas Basketball.
